# See https://github.com/check-spelling/check-spelling/wiki/Configuration-Examples:-patterns

# ignore long runs of a single character:
\b([A-Za-z])\g{-1}{3,}\b

# ignore very long words
[A-Za-z_0-9\-]{15,}

# client ids
c\.[a-zA-Z0-9]+

# png
[A-Za-z_0-9\-]\.png

# urls
https://[^ ]+
http://[^ ]+
www\.[^ ]+

# Tables often break words
\|.+

# Letters followed by numbers are not real words
[A-Za-z]+[0-9_]

[0-9][A-Za-z]+

# Quoted words are ignored
"[^ "]+"
